reviews.review_msg: Bill's the best!  He's engaging, funny, knowledgeable, and unlike many professors I've met communicates a genuine care for his students.  Likes to know what people are doing, and always has his own anecdotes and advice to offer on any subject.  (I just wish he didn't smoke so much!)

Knows his stuff, very intellegent.. however, he's a bit pompous and condescending in discussion... seems to think very highly of himself. Hard, but fair marker. Doesn't do too much to spice up boring subject matter...

I'm a huge fan of Dr. Warriner. I went to her office hours almost every week simply because I really, really talking to her. She was hugely supportive when I needed some pushing in the right direction for my assignments. She didn't favor people at all. I loved this class, as you can probably tell :)
